campPage.establishment: Center for spiritual and physical development
campPage.aboutUsText: The Center for Spiritual and Physical Development «Bethel» is a subsidiary project of the Church of the Nativity of Christ (Berdychiv, Ukraine). For many years, our center has been a place of God's work on the hearts of children, adolescents and young people. In addition to working with children of religious parents, there is also active work among orphans and children from nearby rural schools.
campPage.aboutUsText2: Our goal is first of all to help children know God, to teach them to communicate with Him. And also to spend time in pleasant communication and interesting activities in nature.
campPage.history: For many years we have leased areas for our camps. Thank God, in 2019 we were able to buy territory for our center - an old Soviet camp near the city of Zhytomyr.
campPage.buildingHistory: Since the camp was in poor condition, we began a general reconstruction. However, we need your financial support.

mainPage.message: Therefore, if anyone is in Christ, the new creation has come: The old has gone, the new is here!
